chapter.title: About the &COMPANYABBR;
chapter.para: The &COMPANY; (&COMPANYABBR;) has produced a set of shared technology services that enables state and district education organizations to connect K-12 student data that currently exist in different formats and locations and that do not integrate with one another. The &COMPANYABBR; provides a RESTful interface and tools for building applications to access and manage education data in a Data Store.
The &COMPANYABBR; is an alliance of states, foundations, and educators who aim to accelerate the progress of U.S. public schools toward personalized learning.
For information about the &COMPANYABBR;, see http://slcedu.org/.

chapter.title: Using &COMPANYABBR; Documentation
chapter.para: &COMPANYABBR; has produced documentation to support a variety of audiences. The following is a list of document titles with descriptions and links:

listitem.para: - Documentation for administrators responsible for managing users, applications, and security-related operations in an &COMPANYABBR; deployment.

- Documentation for software developers creating applications that call the &COMPANYABBR; REST API or Java Client Library. This includes details for forming API calls and for setting up and using a Sandbox development environment.
- A complete reference for how educational data is stored within the &COMPANYABBR; Data Store.
- A complete reference for the resources that make up the REST API, including example requests and responses.
